entities.name: kreacher
entities.description: Kreacher is an elf who is being interrogated by Harry. He is described as pitiful, with a bruise on his forehead and swollen eyes. ("The elf lay on the floor, panting and shivering, green mucus glistening around his snot...")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is interrogating Kreacher. He has never seen anything so pitiful as Kreacher. ("Harry had never seen anything so pitiful.")

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Regulus is Master of the house and has disappeared. His mistress is mad with grief because he is gone. ("Master Regulus had disappeared...")

relationships.description: Harry is interrogating Kreacher, trying to get the full story from him. ("So you brought the locket home," he said relentlessly...")

Regulus is Master of the house and Kreacher is his servant. His mistress is mad with grief because Regulus has disappeared. ("Master Regulus had disappeared... And his mistress was mad with grief, because Master Regulus had disappeared...")
